body.p: Thomas Dawson States that he lives about 1 mile from where H. B. Margolyes formally Kept a tavern near Bennetsville Ky I have been at this Tavern and never seen anything amiss at Margolyes Tavern I have Eat at Margolyes and always found good & substantial feed I am a Tavern Keeper myself
Given under my hand this 21st Nov 1861
Sworn to before me this 21st November 1861
Edward Pate J. P. B. C
